q: New Bill to improve school discipline Michael Gove will publish the Education Bill today, which he says will restore discipline and reduce bureaucracy in schools. The Bill is expected to contain measures that will hand greater powers to teachers to search or expel unruly pupils while also giving them greater protection against unfounded allegations.
